welcome_message_body: Welcome to Corona, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, vibrant community, and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your visit.

restaurants.name: Cowboy Surfer Grill
restaurants.description: Cowboy Surfer Grill is a american restaurant located in Corona.

restaurants.description: Chronic Tacos is a taco restaurant located in Corona.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chino Airport provides services for commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Chino Airport serves private and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers to use.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Riverside Municipal Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Riverside Municipal Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 6
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Riverside Fla-Bob Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Riverside Fla-Bob Airport is responsible for handling all cargo and freight shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cable Airport provides services for both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Cable Airport offers amenities and services for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for major airlines such as American Airlines and Delta.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for airlines such as United and Alaska Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial flights and houses various amenities such as restaurants, shops, and lounges.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is designated for private and charter flights, providing a more exclusive and personalized experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and enter the provided password.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Norton AFB Airport serves domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Barstow-Daggett Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
